title: Permission
description: Represents a permission to perform an action on a resource type

resource_type.description: Type of resource this permission applies to (e.g., 'document', 'api', 'user'). Use '*' for all resources.

action.description: Action that can be performed (e.g., 'read', 'write', 'delete'). Use '*' for all actions.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this permission grants

conditions.description: Optional conditions for ABAC (Attribute-Based Access Control)
